评论概述: Absolutely Love It – One of My Favorite Dresses!
评论详情: This GRACE KARIN tweed pencil dress is a total gem! I absolutely loved it from the moment I put it on. The fit is perfect—snug in all the right places but comfortable enough for all-day wear. The cap sleeves and tweed fabric give it a classy, professional look that's ideal for work, yet it’s stylish enough for after-work events, too.  The quality of the fabric and stitching is impressive, and the dress feels much more expensive than it is. I’ve received so many compliments every time I wear it, and it’s become one of my favorite dresses in my wardrobe. If you're looking for something elegant, comfortable, and versatile, this dress is a winner! Highly recommend!
This is now my Monday work dress lol. I will be getting other colors.

评论概述: different companies make this dress so beware of sizing.
评论详情: This is a beautiful dress. That being said sizing varies according to company. I wear a size 14 , but the companies that only allow a large or x large options etc...well, they vary. Grace Karin , order up. Jasambac order true to size ...any other company do not even bother. I have had to return so many for size I have lost count. I love the tweed dresses , but you really have to be careful. Jasambac has the best sizing.

I wore this to a conference and felt very professional and classy. I was tired of wearing pant suits and this was perfect. Doesn’t feel cheap and I didn’t have to worry about it riding up or breasts being exposed. Being in south Florida it’s so hot so I hate wearing long sleeves.

For reference, I am a size 10 in Calvin Klein, Vince Camuto, most dresses that have a bit of stretch.  The medium in this fits me PERFECTLY. Amazon suggested a large, so don't necessarily believe them. The color is more of a warm beige than green but I'm not mad about it, there's some minor metallic thread as well running through.  Will be back in the spring for lighter colors!

5'2 | 140lbs | SM  <<< First clothes review, I get frustrated when I don't get this info from reviews.This dress was the best pleasant surprise all year!!  The color is great - the product color and selling pics are the same; of course looks better in person.My favorite is the material - I was so shocked.  Its lightweight - but not to thin, soft and is somewhat stretchy, somewhat textured, inside is lined, and has a 'thickness' to it.  The last two combined make it so that it does not outline your panty and bra straps - cannot see them (Note this may change if you wear it very tight / stretched) and also smooths / camouflages things that we are self conscious about.  Muffin top and belly for me.  It wears fit on my form, not super snug.  I love, love love this dress and receive several compliments whenever I wear it. This dress can be dressed up or down, its just great!
This dress is perfect, fits like a glove, true to size, fabric is comfortable

评论概述: Nice dress but most likely previously worn
评论详情: I ordered two sizes.  The large was packaged differently from the medium. The large was well folded and had the manufacture/designer tag on and the package was had the designer branding. The medium was repackaged in the Amazon return packaging and folded neatly.  I decided to try the medium first. No manufacture/designer tag attached to the garment. There were some sporadic knitting pulls noted. The garment appeared clean and free of spills. I typically wear a medium size 6-8-10.  This fit well. It is a form fitting dress so it will show every curve, wanted and unwanted.  I am given four stars for the dress but ONE start to Amazon's quality control to ensure the clothing has not been worn.

评论概述: Buyer beware, sizing may differ based on color options (most forgiving is the grey tweed)
评论详情: Cons: 1) Size can differ by color (see below) 2)Threads can be easily removed -file your nails, don't walk by anything with a rough edge, etc 3) Not modern (that can be a plus, depending on the look you are going for)  Pros: 1) Very flattering on a plus sized body 2) Can be professional, seasonal or ? based on color. The navy is very festive 3)The price  I purchased three dresses in the color grey tweed since I was not sure about the sizing. I ended up keeping the large for my mother, she wears a 14/16 in Calvin Klein/Tommy Hilfiger dresses (Calvin Klein dresses are pretty consistent with the sizing).  I was so in love with this dress based on reviews that I purchased the navy in a size large before the three dresses arrived. The navy in a large was almost too tight (I can be a size 8-12 depending on the manufacturer), while the size medium in the grey tweed fit me.

评论概述: Decent cheap dress if you're very comfortable in your body
评论详情: This dress is a solid choice if you're in quick need of a cheap dress in this style, though I would recommend a solid color because the mixed color tweed (at least the gray one) looks really bad unless you're quite far away from it. This dress is VERY form fitting. I definitely ordered the right size, any larger and it would have been hanging off of me, but the fabric clings to every curve you have. I could clearly see my belly button through the dress. Also if you have a decent amount of cleavage, it won't all be covered, so this dress may not be suitable for work for all body types.
This dress fits very well and comfortable to move in.
I LOVE this dress! It had the style and quality I was looking for and just enough stretch to keep me dancing all night at a friend's wedding!

评论概述: Poor Quality -- Ripped on first wear
评论详情: At first, I was impressed with this dress. It fit great when I tried it on and the quality seemed great for the price and it was beautiful. However, when I actually wore it for the first time, it quite literally fell apart. It ripped in two places along the back seam, with one of the holes being about an inch below my butt. Very embarrassing. It also had so many loose threads and snags hanging on it during the first 2 hours of me wearing it that I had to ask a colleague for a pair of scissors because they were so noticeable and bad. I feel like it's important to note that this dress, while form-fitting, was not too tight at all and looked very professional. So, it wasn't my body putting too much stress on the fabric. I also wasn't doing anything crazy that day. I was simply conducting training, so all I was doing was standing up and occasionally walking around. This dress should not have ripped or had that many loose threads from just standing and occasionally walking. I'm really disappointed that I cannot return this because I didn't need to wear it until after a month had passed from purchasing it. It would probably cost more to patch the holes than the dress costs and I honestly wouldn't trust that it wouldn't continue to fall apart in other places, so it looks like it's going in the garbage. :(
I am very happy with this dress. Runs big and stretches, so maybe go down a size?
Material is high end. Great dress. True to size
